title: Detective Conan: The Burning Galactic Railway
original_name: 名探偵コナン 灼熱の銀河鉄道
sinopse: Ran, Sonoko, Conan, and the detective boys board the galactic railway train of Ihatov World, a theme park that reproduces the world of Kenji Miyazawa. While they are enjoying the fantastic starry sky, suddenly a notice from Kid arrives. It's time for a battle for treasure with Kid! But there was an unexpected trap...
